nodes.text: Kafleer Tredahl was an amateur holocam operator native to Corellia.
When Kafleer's mother, named Zayna Tredahl, was kidnapped in 1 ABY, he appealed to Chertyl Ruluwoor for aid.

Kafleer Tredahl appeared as a non-player character in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
